sentences.en: A more prosaic approach was used.
After all those months of deliberation, was this prosaic utterance the pay - off?
sentences.cn: 经过这么多个月的斟酌, 结果就是这些平淡的话语 吗 ?

sentences.en: And Spring Moon had the zest and wit to season the most prosaic of lives.
sentences.cn: 春月有热情,有才智,生活再枯燥,她也能适应.

sentences.en: At this grand moment Pug Henry's thoughts were prosaic.
sentences.cn: 在这个伟大的时刻,帕格?亨利的思想却毫无诗意.

sentences.en: By and by, however , " fervent " gave way to " prosaic ".
sentences.cn: 后来的永远, 也许是从 炽热 走到平淡.

sentences.en: China also has more prosaic reasons for encouraging trade.
sentences.cn: 中国自己还有更现实的理由去鼓励和加强中朝两国的双边贸易.

sentences.en: His instructor offered a more prosaic explanation for the surge in interest.
sentences.cn: 他的老师对利率的急剧上升给出了一个更枯燥乏味的解释。

sentences.en: How prosaic, and yet how magical such paragraphs are!
sentences.cn: 这样的段落是多么平淡, 又多么不可思议 啊 !

sentences.en: No product is prosaic to profit greatly by attractive packaging.
sentences.cn: 靠迷人的包装,任何商品就不会单调“乏味”,因而总能获利不小.

sentences.en: Only love, can be any one in prosaic form.
sentences.cn: 只有爱, 可以是任何一中平淡无奇的形式.

sentences.en: Prosaic also can be a kind of appeal.
Relatively speaking it is a little prosaic.
sentences.cn: 相对说来,那有一点平凡.

sentences.en: The office seems so dull and prosaic after Pine Ridge.
sentences.cn: 从松岭回来后,办公室似乎变得枯燥无味了.

sentences.en: The reality, however, is probably more prosaic.
sentences.cn: 然而，事实很可能更平淡无奇。

sentences.en: These prosaic details take all the sparkle out of the conversation.
sentences.cn: 这些无聊的细节使谈话失去了生气.

words.tran_cn: 平凡的，乏味的；散文体的
